value.Name: Drupal
value.Value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?><FsPickler version="2.0.0.0" type="Microsoft.FSharp.Collections.FSharpList`1[System.String]"><value flags="sequence"><elem>Drupal Core - Critical - Multiple Vulnerabilities</elem><elem>Drupal Core - Critical - Access Bypass</elem><elem>SQL injection vulnerability in the SQL comment filtering system in the Database API</elem><elem>A 3rd party development library including with Drupal 8 development dependencies is vulnerable to remote code execution.</elem><elem>Critical access bypass by authenticated users</elem><elem>PECL YAML parser unsafe object handling</elem></value></FsPickler>
